name: Buckler Expertise
summary: You've learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection.

name: Disarming Flair
summary: It's harder for your foes to regain their grip when you knock their weapon partially out of their hands.

name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
summary: You can parry attacks against you with your weapon.

name: Flying Blade
summary: You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

name: Focused Fascination
summary: When you use Fascinating Performance in a combat encounter, you need only a success, rather than a critical success, to fascinate your target.

name: Goading Feint
summary: When you trick a foe, you can goad them into overextending their next attack.

name: Nimble Dodge
summary: You deftly dodge out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

name: One for All
trait: Auditory, Concentrate, Emotion, Linguistic, Mental, Swashbuckler
summary: With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts.

name: You're Next
trait: Emotion, Fear, Mental, Rogue, Swashbuckler, Visual
summary: After downing a foe, you menace another.

name: After You
summary: You allow your foes to make the first move in a show of incredible confidence.

name: Antagonize
summary: Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire.

name: Charmed Life
summary: When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top.

name: Fane's Fourberie
summary: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

name: Finishing Follow-Through
summary: Finishing a foe maintains your swagger.

name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
summary: Your tumbling catches your foe off guard.

name: Unbalancing Finisher
summary: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance.

name: Devrin's Dazzling Diversion
summary: Devrin Arlos has a habit of using whatever is at hand to temporarily blind others in combat.

name: Flamboyant Athlete
summary: Your panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
summary: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack.

name: Impaling Finisher
summary: You stab two foes with a single thrust or bash them together with one punch.

name: Leading Dance
summary: You sweep your foe into your dance.

name: Masquerade of Seasons Stance
summary: You have mastered the opening steps to the Masquerade of Seasons, a dance that channels the power of spring, summer, winter, and autumn.

name: Swaggering Initiative
summary: You swagger readily into any fightâ€”even an ambush.

name: Agile Maneuvers
summary: Your easily maneuver against your foes.

name: Attack of Opportunity
summary: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Combination Finisher
summary: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow.

name: Pirouette
summary: You twirl gracefully, spinning on one foot to evade your opponent's attack.

name: Precise Finisher
summary: Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot.

name: Stella's Stab and Snag
summary: You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement.

name: Vexing Tumble
summary: You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions.

name: Bleeding Finisher
summary: Your blow inflicts profuse bleeding.

name: Dual Finisher
summary: You split your attacks.

name: Flamboyant Cruelty
summary: You love to kick your enemies when they're down, and you look fabulous when you do.

name: Grand Dance
summary: You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance.

name: Knight's Retaliation
summary: You knock the enemy's blow aside and twist, unbalancing your foe.

name: Nimble Roll
summary: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

name: Stunning Finisher
summary: You attempt a dizzying blow.

name: Vivacious Bravado
summary: Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain.

name: Buckler Dance
summary: You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack.

name: Corpse-Killer's Defiance
summary: You defy Tar-Baphon with every undead you destroy, using your victory to rally your allies.

name: Dazzling Display
summary: You perform a bewildering show of prowess, such as by whirling and flashing a weapon, that unnerves foes.

name: Derring-Do
summary: When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
summary: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Reflexive Riposte
summary: You can riposte almost without a thought.

name: Targeting Finisher
summary: Your attack harms and hinders your foe.

name: Cheat Death
summary: Somehow you always escape the reaper by a hair's breadth.

name: Mobile Finisher
summary: You attack in motion.

name: Flamboyant Leap
summary: You stylishly leap and deliver a powerful finisher.

name: Impossible Riposte
summary: Your ripostes can deflect attacks back at their source.

name: Perfect Finisher
summary: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault.

name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
summary: You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Deadly Grace
summary: Your graceful attacks are especially powerful.

name: Felicitous Riposte
summary: You take advantage of your foe's openings with uncanny odds.

name: Incredible Luck
summary: You always seem to bounce back from the worst.

name: Lethal Finisher
summary: You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright.

name: Parry and Riposte
summary: Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
summary: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses.

name: Panache Paragon
summary: You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks.

name: Vivacious Afterimage
source: <row gap="tiny">Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 77</row>
summary: You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you.
